name: Funda tabaco liar / Rolling tobacco pouch AFRICA
description:
Bolsillo con cremallera para guardar el tabaco de liar y compartimento para filtros y otro para el librillo de papel. 
Medidas 15 x 18 cm. 
Tejido 100% algodón. 
Lavar en lavadora con agua fría.

---

Zip pocket to keep the rolling tobacco and filters compartment and another one for the paper booklet. 
Cotton 100% 
Size 6 x 7 inch 
Machine Washable

name: Estuche XL / Pencil Case ORGANIC
description:
Estuche con cierre de cremallera, perfecta para todos tus lapices, productos de baño, cremas, maquillajes, para guardar tus trabajos de crochet, etc. 
Consta de forro interior y un asa para transportarla. 
Lavable. Edición limitada. 
Características: 
Tejido de loneta 100% algodón. 
Medidas: 26 x 9 x 9 (alto) cm.

-------------------------------

Zipper box bag with handle. Perfect for pencils, bath products, creams, makeup, knitting or craft projects. 
Whether for travel or just to keep your goodies contained in style at home. 
Consists of lining and a handle for carrying. 
Made with high quality. Fabric is strong and durable. Really handsome and practical gift! 
Machine-washable. Limited edition. 
Canvas Cotton 100% 
Size: 10 x 3.5 x 3.5 (tall) inches.

name: Lapicero enrollable / Pencil Case TEA TIME
description:
8 departamentos para guardar lápices, pinceles, rotuladores, brochas de maquillaje, etc... con lazo para cierre.

Tejido 100% algodón.
Medidas: 30 x 20 cm.
Lavable en lavadora.

-----------------------------

8 departments to store pencils, pens, markers or makeup brush, etc , ... with loop closure.

Cotton 100%
Size: 12 x 8 inches.
Machine-washable
Pencil are not included

name: Minimochila / Minibackpack MATROSHKA
description:
Mochila hecha a mano pensada para los más peques, única y muy cómoda para la guardería o colegio, excursiones, para el parque...para llevar la merienda y algún juguete.
En el interior cuenta con un forro, lo que la hace muy resistente.
Tejido y cuerda 100% algodón. 
Dimensiones: 22x30 cm. 
Lavable en lavadora.

-------------------------

Handmade backpack designed for kids, unique and very comfortable for day care or school,trips to the park ... to bring a snack and a toy. This backpack is perfect for preschool age kids who want something unique and trendy to carry their stuff in.
To carry a lunch and necessities for a park outing, and for collecting little treasures on your toddler's adventures.
Inside has a lining, that makes it very resistant.
Cotton (fabric and rope) 100%
Size: 8,6 x 11,8 inches.
Machine-washable.

name: Zurrón / Messenger Bag ROJO
description:
Bolso tipo mensajero, zurrón, bandolera perfecto para llevar el portatil de 15 pulgadas, carpetas A4 y todo lo que necesites. Con cremallera para que sea mas seguro.
Con asa ajustable para poder llevarlo en el hombro o cruzado en el pecho.
La solapa puede ir hacia arriba ganando mucha amplitud.

La tela exterior es de alta calidad 100% algodón y es combinable con toda la ropa.
Tiene un forro de loneta 100 algodón y un bolsillo interior de 20 x 25 cm.
Asa de Nylon de 140cm de largo.

Las dimensiones del bolso son 45 x33 cm y con la solapa doblada 33x 33 cm

--------------------------

This mesenger bag is big enought to hold lots of your essentials, books, A4 folder and laptop 15".
It's a color that could go with everything.
The strap is adjustable and can wear it under your arm or across your chest.
There is a zipper clousure on the top of the bag to keep your items sure.
Inside has a lining, that makes it very resistant and a pocket to keep things at hand ( 8 x  10 inches)

High quality fabric 100% cotton. 
Cotton canvas lining.
The strap is nylon.

Dimensions: 18 x 13 inches.
When flap is folded the dimensions are 13 x13 inches.
The strap is 55 inches.
